channel.title: Paul Hackett - Be Back Soon! x
channel.description: Be good! More coming before xmas x
channel.itunes:subtitle: Underground House n Garage
channel.itunes:author: Paul Hackett

item.title: Be Back Soon! x
item.description: As some of you know`I'll be off the radar for the next 18mnths or so so I thought I should get busy and upload some mixes so you all dont forget me! More to come over the weeekend. Paul x Tracklist: (1) Colonel Abrams - Trapped (Acappella) - MCA Records (2) Marvin Belton - Back to Africa - Decoder Musique (3) Johnny Fiasco (Feat Jackie) - All Right - Tonic (4) Miguel Migs - Check This Out - Salted Music (5) Chuck Love - Spread The Love - Salted Music (6) ???????????????????????????????????????????? (7) Troydon - To The Beat - NIghtShift (8) Homemade Jams Vol.1 - Soo NIce - White Label (Is this Chris Duckenfield??) (9) Troydon - Steppin Up - NIghtshift (10) Johnny Fiasco - Mocha Disko - Jamayka (11) Gene Farris - Keep it Comin - Industry (12) Free Joel & F3R - Summer Time - Negrita Family (13) Kerri Chandler - Return to Acid - Large (14) Homemade Jams Vol.1 - I Wasn't Kidding - White Label (15) Colonel Abrams - Trapped (Dub Mix) - MCA Records (16) Pete Moss - What We Had is Gone - Ovum (17) Littlemen - Stoned - Mobile Trax (18) Panyard - Baby 3 Times - Diaspora (19) Jon Cutler Feat Sarah Anne Web - Dawn - Papa (20) DJ Spen & The Muthafunkaz Feat Ann Nesby - Its So Easy (12" MIx) - Code Red (21) Jon Cutler - Lifted Up - Distant (22) Alexander East - Feel Me (JT Donaldson MIx) - Amenti (23) Joey Youngman - Schizophunkia - Good Family (24) Joey Youngman - Luv Bump - Good Family (25) Joey Youngman - Fascination - Goof Family (26) Trademarq - Orange Julius - Bananza (27) Littlemen - Get Funky - Mobile Trax (28) Pete Moss - In Your Head - Ovum (29) Doug Willis - Get YOur OWn - Joey Negro Mix - Z Records
item.dc:creator: Paul Hackett
item.itunes:summary:
As some of you know`I'll be off the radar for the next 18mnths or so so I thought I should get busy and upload some mixes so you all dont forget me!
More to come over the weeekend. Paul x
Tracklist:
(1) Colonel Abrams - Trapped (Acappella) - MCA Records (2) Marvin Belton - Back to Africa - Decoder Musique (3) Johnny Fiasco (Feat Jackie) - All Right - Tonic (4) Miguel Migs - Check This Out - Salted Music (5) Chuck Love - Spread The Love - Salted Music (6) ???????????????????????????????????????????? (7) Troydon - To The Beat - NIghtShift (8) Homemade Jams Vol.1 - Soo NIce - White Label (Is this Chris Duckenfield??) (9) Troydon - Steppin Up - NIghtshift (10) Johnny Fiasco - Mocha Disko - Jamayka (11) Gene Farris - Keep it Comin - Industry (12) Free Joel & F3R - Summer Time - Negrita Family (13) Kerri Chandler - Return to Acid - Large (14) Homemade Jams Vol.1 - I Wasn't Kidding - White Label (15) Colonel Abrams - Trapped (Dub Mix) - MCA Records (16) Pete Moss - What We Had is Gone - Ovum (17) Littlemen - Stoned - Mobile Trax (18) Panyard - Baby 3 Times - Diaspora (19) Jon Cutler Feat Sarah Anne Web - Dawn - Papa (20) DJ Spen & The Muthafunkaz Feat Ann Nesby - Its So Easy (12" MIx) - Code Red (21) Jon Cutler - Lifted Up - Distant (22) Alexander East - Feel Me (JT Donaldson MIx) - Amenti (23) Joey Youngman - Schizophunkia - Good Family (24) Joey Youngman - Luv Bump - Good Family (25) Joey Youngman - Fascination - Goof Family (26) Trademarq - Orange Julius - Bananza (27) Littlemen - Get Funky - Mobile Trax (28) Pete Moss - In Your Head - Ovum (29) Doug Willis - Get YOur OWn - Joey Negro Mix - Z Records

item.title: March Podcast - A Brazilian Twist
item.description: I hope you enjoy my first Podcast! This month is underground house with a Samba Flavour Tracklist: (57mins) 01 Miguel Migs - Life & Music (Salted) 02 Dennis Ferrer - Reach for Freedom (Defected) 03 DJ Jori - Brazil Horns (Danny Krivit edit) (Distant) 04 Tony Senghore & Martin Venetjoki - We look for Love (Panhandle) 05 DJ Camacho Ft Janae Jordan - Me (The Shelter Anthem) (Shelter) 06 Jon Cutler - Lifted (dub) (Distant) 07 Brothers Vibe - Your All I Want (Mixx) 08 Iz & Diz - Unnnhhh (Classic) 09 Dennis Ferrer - Destination (Defected) 10 Sabrynah Pope - Someone For You (Greg Gauthier & Tony L) (KIF) If you enjoy the mix please come and say hello!
item.dc:creator: Paul Hackett
item.itunes:summary:
I hope you enjoy my first Podcast! This month is underground house with a Samba Flavour
Tracklist:
(57mins)
01 Miguel Migs - Life & Music (Salted) 02 Dennis Ferrer - Reach for Freedom (Defected) 03 DJ Jori - Brazil Horns (Danny Krivit edit) (Distant) 04 Tony Senghore & Martin Venetjoki - We look for Love (Panhandle) 05 DJ Camacho Ft Janae Jordan - Me (The Shelter Anthem) (Shelter) 06 Jon Cutler - Lifted (dub) (Distant) 07 Brothers Vibe - Your All I Want (Mixx) 08 Iz & Diz - Unnnhhh (Classic) 09 Dennis Ferrer - Destination (Defected) 10 Sabrynah Pope - Someone For You (Greg Gauthier & Tony L) (KIF)
If you enjoy the mix please come and say hello!
